actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Army to convey certain real properties of the Corps of Engineers in the State of Ohio to local governments of the State of Ohio.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to convey to: (1) the city of Steubenville, Ohio, certain real property located at the Pike Island Locks and Dam; and (2) Kinsman Township, Trumbull County, Ohio, certain real property located at the Shenango River Lake project.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Army to convey certain real properties of the Corps of Engineers in the State of Ohio to local governments of the State of Ohio.
